activities: We are a full service marketing research organization who sometimes collect attitude and opinion research information from consumers outside of the US, including Europe.  Occasionally, personal information such as email address and name are also collected for the purposes of completing the marketing research process.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We are self regulating, but abide by the CASRO standards on privacy.
